meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure of my academic path in art studies
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Richard, and I'm a second-year art major. Last semester was really tough — I struggled in most of my art classes, and I ended up with a D-average. It’s not like I didn’t do well in some of the more abstract or technical courses, but I just couldn’t keep up. I’m majoring in art because I’ve always loved art, and I’ve been really passionate about it. I’ve always thought I’d major in something like English or history, but now I’m not sure what I should be doing. I’m interested in art history, but I don’t know if that’s a good fit or if I should be majoring in something else entirely. I’m also interested in writing and performance, but I’m not sure how to combine those two in a way that makes sense. I’m trying to talk to my professors, but I’m not sure how to articulate what I’m really struggling with or what I’m asking for help on. I’m hoping to schedule an appointment soon so I can get some guidance.
